weapons.name: Death's Kiss - Models on Foot only
weapons.description: Great Weapon EnchantmentAttacks made with this weapon gain +1 Strength, +1 Armour Penetration, Magical Attacks, and Multiple Wounds (2).

weapons.name: Transcendence
weapons.description: Hand Weapon, Paired Weapons, Halberd and Lance Enchantment.Attacks made with this weapon gain Lethal Strike and Magical Attacks. For every unsaved wound inflicted by attacks made with it, the wielder gains +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration for the remainder of the game, to a maximum of +2 each.

weapons.name: Moraec's Reaping
weapons.description: Hand Weapon and Paired Weapons enchantment.The wielder always has at least Attack Value 4. Attacks with this weapon gain Magical Attacks, Death Trance, and always ​have at least Strength 4 and at least Armour Penetration 3. For each unsaved wound inflicted with this weapon, the owner gains one Veil Token.

armours.name: Seal of the Republic - Models on Foot only
armours.description: Heavy Armour EnchantmentFor each unsaved wound inflicted by the wearer’s Close Combat Attacks, the wearer gains +1 to its Armour for the remainder of the game.

armours.name: Terrifying Visage
armours.description: Shield EnchantmentThe bearer gains Distracting while using this Shield.

artefacts.name: Midnight Cloak
artefacts.description: ArtefactThe wearer gains Devastating Charge (Multiple Wounds (D3)) and Aegis (3+) against Ranged Attacks. Cannot be taken by models with Towering Presence.

artefacts.name: Amulet of Spite - Wizards only
artefacts.description: ArtefactIn each friendly Magic Phase, after drawing a Flux Card, the owner gains an additional Magic Dice. In each of the opponent’s Magic Phases, after drawing a Flux Card, the owner must discard a single Magic Dice.

artefacts.name: Pendant of Disdain
artefacts.description: ArtefactThe bearer gains Aegis (4+, against Strength 5 or more).

artefacts.name: Beastmaster's Lash
artefacts.description: ArtefactThe roll for determining the number of hits from stomp attacks of friendly Gigantic models within 12" of the bearer is subject to Maximised Roll. The roll for determining the number of hits from Stomp attacks of enemy Gigantic models within 12" of the bearer is subject to Minimised Roll.

artefacts.name: Ring of Shadows
artefacts.description: ArtefactIf the bearer's unit consists of entirely Standard Size models, - All models in the unit gain Hard Target. - Close Combat attacks allocated towards models in the bearer's unit suffer -1 Offensive Skill.

artefacts.name: Wandering Familiar - Dominant
artefacts.description: ArtefactAt the start of each friendly Magic Phase, you may place a familiar counter with a 20x20mm base within 6" of the bearer. This familiar acts (and is subject to the same restrictions) as a model of Standard Size for the purpose of drawing Line of Sight. It must be placed more than 1" away from other models and from Impassable Terrain. Once it is placed, the player must declare which Facing of the familiar is its Front Facing. Whenever the bearer casts a non-Bound Spell, they may choose to use the position of their familiar when drawing Line of Sight, measuring Range and determining Front Arc (they must use all of these or none at all). At the end of the Magic Phase, the familiar is removed.

artefacts.name: Elixir of Shadows - Assassins only
artefacts.description: ArtefactOne use only. May be activated at the start of any Round of Combat. Until the end of the phase, the bearer gains Divine Attacks and must reroll failed to-wound rolls with its Close Combat Attacks. At the end of the phase, the bearer loses 1 Health Point (with no saves of any kind allowed).

standards.name: Banner of Gar Daecos - Cannot be taken by Core units
standards.description: Banner EnchantmentAll friendly units Engaged in the same Combat as the bearer gain Death Trance.

standards.name: Banner of Blood
standards.description: Banner EnchantmentModel parts without Harnessed in the bearer's unit gains Devastating Charge (+1 Att).

standards.name: Academy Banner - Dread Legionnaires, Repeater Auxilliaries and Corsairs only
standards.description: Banner EnchantmentR&F models in the bearer's unit gain +1 AP in the first round of combat. Dread Legionnaires, Repeater Auxiliaries, and Corsairs in units within 6" of one or more other unit with Academy Banner gain +1 AP in the first round of combat.

specialrules.specialrule: Wizard Conclave  (Altered Sight, Ice and Fire - Cosmology, Crippling Fatigue - Hereditary Spell)
